UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile and basic information.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

emailVerified.description: Whether the user's email has been verified.

emailVerifiedAt.description: The timestamp when the email was verified.

phoneVerified.description: Whether the user's phone has been verified.

phoneVerifiedAt.description: The timestamp when the phone was verified.

isAdmin.description: Whether the user has admin privileges.

LegalDocument.title: Legal Document
LegalDocument.description: Stores the content for legal pages like Terms of Use or Privacy Policy.

content.description: The full content of the document in Markdown format.

RecentNote.title: Recent Note
RecentNote.description: Represents a single set of AI-generated study notes, linked to a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this note.

GeneratedContent.title: Generated Content
GeneratedContent.description: Container for various types of AI-generated content linked to a note or study space.

podcastAudioUrl.description: URL to the audio file in Cloud Storage.

imageUrl.description: URL to the image file in Cloud Storage.

Testimonial.title: Testimonial
Testimonial.description: Represents a user testimonial for display on the landing page.

name.description: The name of the person giving the testimonial.

title.description: The title or role of the person (e.g., 'WASSCE Candidate').

text.description: The full text content of the testimonial.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the testimonial was added.

/legal_content/{documentId}.description: Stores content for legal pages like 'terms_of_use' and 'privacy_policy'.

/notes/{noteId}.description: Top-level collection for all user notes.

/testimonials/{testimonialId}.description: Stores user testimonials for the landing page.
